name: Upper Limit Aviation
about: Upper Limit Aviation is a Part 141 FAA-approved professional flight school offering training in both fixed-wing and rotor-wing aircraft. Located in Utah and California, we provide career-minded students with comprehensive training programs, including Private Pilot, Instrument, Commercial, and Certified Flight Instructor (CFI) certifications. Our experienced instructors and modern, well-maintained fleet ensure a safe and effective learning environment. We also offer a Professional Drone Program and an Airline Career Pathway with partnerships for tuition reimbursement and signing bonuses. With a strong focus on safety, financial transparency, and alumni success, Upper Limit Aviation is committed to helping students achieve their aviation goals. Choose Upper Limit Aviation for a rigorous and rewarding flight training experience.
